title: Possible ghost game (or other unknown bug)
body:
currently, i am stuck whenever I try to enter a game, I get presented with a non-functional (classic ghost game).

the odd thing is:
it happened on bot eune and euw
I have not been active for about a week
it persisted when wireless and wired
disabling firewall did not resolve the issue
re-installing league did not resolve the issue
re-installing windows did not resolve the issue


this has lasted for several days. currently, this mess has netted me a 5x20min queue timer on euw
are there any ways to resolve this issue?

replies.body: Hmmmm so what exactly is going on when you try entering games? Are you simply getting stuck on the reconnect screen and the game itself or loading screen never shows? If that's the case it may not be a ghost game at all, and rather something actually blocking your network from reaching our servers. I'd like you to be sure and update your firewall exceptions with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) just in case something was still getting in the way. If that doesn't help, do me a favor and try updating your [**port forward settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8) as well.
